templates.title: AI Experiment Design Framework
templates.description: A comprehensive template for designing and documenting AI experiments

fields.label: Experiment Name
fields.placeholder: Enter a descriptive name for your experiment

fields.label: Research Question
fields.placeholder: What problem are you trying to solve?

fields.label: Model Architecture
fields.placeholder: Describe the AI model architecture

fields.label: Dataset Selection
fields.placeholder: Describe the datasets used

fields.label: Evaluation Metrics
fields.placeholder: List the metrics used to evaluate the model

fields.label: Experimental Setup
fields.placeholder: Describe the experimental setup and environment

fields.label: Methodology
fields.placeholder: Describe the methodology used

fields.label: Implementation Details
fields.placeholder: Provide technical implementation details

fields.label: Results Analysis
fields.placeholder: Analyze and interpret the results

fields.label: Future Work
fields.placeholder: Suggest future improvements and research directions

templates.author: AI Research Team

templates.title: Clinical Trial Protocol
templates.description: A comprehensive template for clinical trial documentation

fields.label: Trial Name
fields.placeholder: Enter the official trial name

fields.label: Protocol Title
fields.placeholder: Enter the protocol title

fields.label: Study Objectives
fields.placeholder: List the primary and secondary objectives

fields.label: Inclusion Criteria
fields.placeholder: List the inclusion criteria

fields.label: Exclusion Criteria
fields.placeholder: List the exclusion criteria

fields.label: Study Overview
fields.placeholder: Provide a comprehensive overview of the study

fields.label: Study Design
fields.placeholder: Describe the study design and methodology

fields.label: Participant Information
fields.placeholder: Describe participant recruitment and management

fields.label: Study Procedures
fields.placeholder: Detail the study procedures and interventions

fields.label: Data Collection
fields.placeholder: Describe data collection methods and schedule

fields.label: Statistical Analysis
fields.placeholder: Detail the statistical analysis plan

fields.label: Ethics and Safety
fields.placeholder: Describe ethical considerations and safety measures

templates.author: Healthcare Research Team

templates.title: Legal Contract Framework
templates.description: A comprehensive template for legal contracts

fields.label: Contract Name
fields.placeholder: Enter the contract name

fields.label: Party A Details
fields.placeholder: Enter details for the first party

fields.label: Party B Details
fields.placeholder: Enter details for the second party

fields.label: Contract Background
fields.placeholder: Describe the background and purpose of the contract

fields.label: Scope of Work
fields.placeholder: Define the scope of work or services

fields.label: Parties
fields.placeholder: List and describe all parties involved

fields.label: Recitals
fields.placeholder: State the background and purpose of the contract

fields.label: Definitions
fields.placeholder: Define key terms used in the contract

fields.label: Agreement Terms
fields.placeholder: Detail the main terms of the agreement

fields.label: Obligations
fields.placeholder: List the obligations of each party

fields.label: Intellectual Property
fields.placeholder: Define IP rights and ownership

fields.label: Dispute Resolution
fields.placeholder: Detail the dispute resolution process

templates.author: Legal Team
